Name: Mysore Muzzle Loader Espresso Blend
TastingNotes: Bold and syrupy with deep cocoa, roasted nut, and warm spice notes, crafted for a rich and crema-heavy espresso shot.

Name: Colombia Royal Select MWP Decaf
TastingNotes: Smooth and mellow with notes of milk chocolate, toasted nuts, and a soft sweetness, finishing clean without bitterness.

Name: Colombia Antioquia Amagá Supremo
TastingNotes: Sweet and lively with citrus brightness, caramelized sugar notes, and a clean finish with hints of almond.

Name: Vietnam Lam Dong Duc Trong
TastingNotes: Smooth and earthy with rich chocolate depth, subtle spice, and a lingering sweetness reminiscent of molasses.

Name: Colombia Supremo EP Huila
TastingNotes: Bright and balanced with notes of red apple, caramel sweetness, and a hint of cocoa on the finish.
